TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions, class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public Class DynamicField Inherits DataControlField Implements IAttributeAccessor, IFieldFormattingOptions
type DynamicField = class inherit DataControlField interface IAttributeAccessor interface IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 表示一个数据字段，该字段显示在使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能的数据绑定控件中。

span.span: Represents a data field that is displayed in a data-bound control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类由数据绑定控件，如和控件，以显示自定义页中使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能的字段值。The class is used by data-bound controls, such as the and controls, to display a field value that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in custom pages. 类提供的功能，类似于类。The class provides functionality that resembles that of the class. 但是，因为动态数据应用程序中使用对象时，您可以利用以下动态数据功能：However, because a object is used in Dynamic Data applications, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - 自动使用字段模板呈现的字段的适当控制，根据数据类型。Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type. 可以为整个应用程序全局修改的字段模板。The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application. - 提供基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema. 此外可以通过自定义数据模型添加验证类型。You can also add validation types by customizing the data model. - 通过使用数据模型中的属性或通过使用自定义的各个字段的数据呈现属性。Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the property. 对象使用的呈现每个字段`DynamicControl`控件。The object renders each field by using a `DynamicControl` control. 若要指定要在中显示的数据字段对象，设置属性设置为字段名称。To specify the data field to display in a object, set the property to the field name. 通过设置应用于字段值的自定义格式设置字符串属性。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the property. 默认情况下的格式设置字符串被应用于字段值中，仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式下时。By default the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于值显示的数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时，设置属性设置为`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果字段值是`null`，可以通过设置显示的自定义标题属性。If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 对象也会自动转换为空字符串 ("") 通过设置字段值与 null 值属性设置为`true`。The object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 此功能的运行时代码示例，请参阅：[运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField). 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中控件来显示和编辑数据库表中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the object in a control to display and edit values from a database table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

span.span: Model Binding and Web Forms

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要动态添加对象传递给数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以向数据绑定控件动态添加字段，但强烈建议，字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明的所有应用字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.

Public Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当数据字段处于编辑模式时，是否将 属性指定的带格式的字符串应用于字段值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted string that is specified by the property is applied to field value when the data field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果 在编辑模式下应用格式设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the applies formatting in edit mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件 (如，和) 具有不同显示模式，允许用户读取、 编辑或插入记录。Data-bound controls (such as , and ) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records. 默认情况下，通过将指定格式设置字符串仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式时，将属性应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于值显示的数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时，设置属性设置为`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 一个对象不会自动删除格式设置的数据源中更新字段时。A object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果不希望的格式存储的值的一部分，你需要删除格式设置以编程方式。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 如果为 ，则将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值；否则为 。

span.span: to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时用户可能会为字段值更新或插入记录时输入空字符串。Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用属性指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为 null 时在数据源中更新数据字段。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source. 默认情况下，对象可为 null 值显示为空字符串。By default, a object displays null values as empty strings. 若要显示不同的值，请设置属性。To display a different value, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 对象的数据源控件的父控件绑定对象也有一个名为。The object of the data source control that the parent control of object is bound to also has a property named . 此属性执行相同的功能。This property performs the same function. 请确保正确设置这两个属性。Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法复制当前的属性对象传递给对象中传递`newField`参数。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.

para.span: 调用基类的方法，以便的属性类也会被复制。

span.span: Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

summary.span: 获取或设置要将 对象绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind the object to.

value.span: 对象绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the data field that the object is bound to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到的数据字段对象。Use the property to specify the data field to bind to the object. 数据字段可以是列名称的或对于外键列，关系名称。The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name. 默认情况下，指定的数据字段显示通过对象使用字段数据类型与关联的字段模板。By default, the specified data field is displayed by the object using the field template that is associated with the field data type. 你可以通过设置呈现的数据字段的字段模板属性。You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the property. 此外可以设置显示的文本格式设置属性。You can also format the displayed text by setting the property. 如果字段值为`null`，空字符串 ("") 默认情况下显示的值。If a field value is `null`, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default. 若要指定备用的标题，请设置属性。To specify an alternate caption, set the property. **请注意**如果你想要更改的显示和行为的数据字段的全局范围内，必须将特性应用到数据模型而不是此设置中的特定实例对象。**Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 方法调用以引发状态更改事件时属性设置。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DataFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFormatString
Public Property DataFormatString As String
public: property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为数据字段的值指定显示格式的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 为数据字段的值指定显示格式的格式设置字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对值应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定在显示的值的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the object. 如果属性未设置，而无需任何特殊格式显示的字段值。If the property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting. 默认情况下，格式设置字符串应用于字段值，其中包含的数据绑定控件时仅对象处于只读模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于字段值在编辑模式下，设置属性设置为`true`。To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 使用指定的显示格式属性是特定于此实例的类。The display format that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 您还可以更改数据字段的显示格式在整个应用程序通过应用到你的数据模型和设置命名构造函数中的参数。You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model and setting the named parameter in the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式

span.span: Formatting Types in .NET

summary.span: 获取或设置在包含 对象的数据绑定控件的标题中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

value.span: 在包含 对象的数据绑定控件的标题中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性用来标识数据绑定控件中的字段的友好名称。Use the property to identify a field in a data-bound control with a friendly name. 最常见的应用属性将提供有意义的列名中的数据字段或控件。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names to data fields in a or control. 默认情况下属性使用通过设置数据字段的显示名称属性。By default, the property uses the display name set for the data field by using the attribute. 如果未设置的显示名称，属性使用的值属性。If the display name is not set, the property uses the value of the property.

exception.span: 对象位于一个数据绑定控件内，该控件未绑定到实现 接口的数据源控件。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 对象中显示数据字段值之前，这些数据字段值是否经过 HTML 编码。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果字段值在显示前已经过了 HTML 编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要指定字段值是否经过 HTML 编码为其各自的字符串表示形式显示这些属性。Use the property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed. > [!NOTE] > HTML 编码的字段值有助于防止跨站点脚本攻击和恶意内容显示。HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. 只要有可能，应启用此属性。This property should be enabled whenever possible. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

span.span: Script Exploits Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public string NullDisplayText { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取或设置当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时字段值存储为 null 的数据源中。Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source. 可以指定要用于通过设置具有 null 值的数据字段显示的自定义标题属性。You can specify a custom caption to display for data fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性，null 字段值显示为空字符串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").

summary.span: 获取动态字段的只读状态。

span.span: Gets the read-only state of the dynamic field.
The read-only state of the dynamic field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，则控件加载只读的模板。If the property is `true`, the control loads a read-only template. 此属性需要启用视图状态。This property requires that view state be enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置当数据字段用于排序数据源时所使用的排序表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

value.span: 当数据字段用于排序数据源时所使用的排序表达式。

span.span: The sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将尝试使用的值与关联的列对象的属性通过设置对象属性。The property tries to use the value of the property of the column object that is associated with the object by setting the property. 方法调用以引发状态更改事件时属性设置。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 对象位于一个数据绑定控件内，该控件未绑定到实现 接口的数据源控件。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示数据字段的字段模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the field template to use for displaying the data field.

value.span: 用于显示数据字段的字段模板的名称。

span.span: The name of the field template to use for displaying the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要用于显示数据字段的 UI 的字段模板。Use the property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field. 默认情况下的字段模板为用户控件，其名称包含后缀来标识用于编辑操作和插入操作的字段模板。Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations. 后缀分别为 （_e） 和 （_i）。The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively. 当将值设置为属性，则设置不带后缀的名称。When you set a value to the property, you set the name without the suffixes. 动态数据将确定数据字段的当前模式，并将呈现正确的字段模板。Dynamic Data will identify the current mode of the data field and will render the correct field template. 如果属性未设置时，默认情况下动态数据将呈现基于字段类型的字段模板。If the property is not set, Dynamic Data by default will render the field template based on the field type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12). 使用指定的字段模板属性是特定于此实例的类。The field template that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 你可以通过应用在整个应用程序使用的数据字段的字段模板对数据模型。You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model. 设置属性将替代应用于数据模型的元数据。Setting the property overrides the metadata applied to the data model. 有关元数据特性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 方法调用以引发状态更改事件时属性设置。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview
